title: League of Legends Yearbook
body:
Hey guys! 

SoulessGamer had an [awesome idea](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/gmzeYfTh-league-of-legends-year-book) to create a League of Legends yearbook! 

**Let's do it!**

What's a quote that really encompasses a champion's existence in the 2015 season? What would your champion say about themselves, or even another champion? Be creative! Hopefully we can come up with a quote for everyone!

replies.body: {{champion:33}} "Ok"
{{champion:86}}
{{champion:119}} "Why is the whole book not full of pictures of me?"
{{champion:81}} so this is what smite does?

> [{quoted}](name=PiRoScOuT,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=6zXIPeNA,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-09-04T18:05:17.394+0000)
>

Oh man this one is my favorite.
{{champion:45}} "Wait! Where are you going?! My stun hasn't activated yet!"
{{champion:133}} "Don't worry, Val, we'll get noticed someday. :'("

"Squaaak"
"Who's There?"
"Squaaark" 
"Valor, don't talk about me like that"

{{champion:222}} Well can't argue with that
yea, the new lore really cost him an **ARM** and a leg :p

{{champion:161}}

"Hold still, I'm triangulating..."

{{champion:245}} This is getting old. I've been repeating the eighth grade for about seven years now, it still isn't funny.

{{champion:37}} .......

{{champion:82}} "You can do anything you believe, unless you're me, then you're stuck in bot lane."

Before i start mine, can we please try to keep the salt out of these quotes. Its supposed to be fun, not for venting

Another staple of Yearbooks are the "Superlatives", or the "Most Likely To..." Awards.

**Most Likely To Succeed**
{{champion:119}}  (Duh)

Here are some others!

**Most Likely To Talk Their Way Out Of Detention**
{{champion:103}} 

**Most Likely To Travel The World**
{{champion:432}} 

**Most Likely To Teach At This School**
{{champion:27}} [Chemistry]
*(Runner Up: Heimerdinger, Shop Class)*

**Most Likely To Take Over The World**
{{champion:112}} 

**Best School Spirit**
{{champion:77}} *(Best Mascot Ever!)*

**Class Flirt**
{{champion:245}} *(He can keep trying new pick up lines)*

**Hall Monitor Of The Year**
{{champion:86}}

Ziggs has one quote that was his first quote he said in game on my first time playing. "Dont worry, i got this." That quote summarizes me and is the best quote ever. I say it before i do anything stupid.
